title: Multi-INT Fusion for Threat Network
description: An analyst must fuse HUMINT, SIGINT, and financial intelligence (FININT) to map a terrorist network.

tasks.description: Analyze HUMINT reports to identify key individuals in the network.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst extracts the names and roles of key network members.

tasks.description: Analyze SIGINT to map communications between the identified individuals.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst creates a link analysis chart showing who is talking to whom.

tasks.description: Analyze FININT to identify financial transactions between the individuals, confirming the network's structure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst uses financial data to validate the network map and identify the leader.
